query.statement:
SELECT A.LIFNR ,A.CS406_EDT EDT ,A.CS406_CPT CPT ,A.CS406_FCD FCD ,A.CS406_TP1 TP1 ,A.CS406_TP2 TP2 ,A.CS406_TP3 TP3 ,A.CS406_TP4 TP4 ,A.CS406_RGD RGD ,A.CS406_RGN RGN ,A.CS406_SCP SCP ,A.CS406_RNAME RNAME ,A.CS406_EMAIL EMAIL ,A.CS406_HP HP ,E.CS409_TEL TEL ,E.CS409_FAX FAX ,B.NAME1 BSU_NM ,E.CS409_ZIP ZIPCODE ,E.CS409_ADR ADDR ,E.CS409_ADR2 ADDR2 ,SAPHEE.CODE_CONV(A.MANDT,'CS115',C.BSU_ARA) ARA_NM ,SAPHEE.CODE_CONV(A.MANDT,'VKGRP',C.VKGRP) TEM_NM ,C.LGORT BSU ,D.MIQ CNT_M ,D.TCQ CNT_U ,D.MIQ + D.TCQ CNT_ALL ,'' FLAG
FROM SAPHEE.ZCST406 A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMMT012 B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.LIFNR = B.LIFNR
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZWBT010 C ON A.MANDT = C.MANDT AND A.LIFNR = C.LIFNR
LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT YYYYMM, BSU, MIQ, TCQ, MANDT, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY BSU ORDER BY YYYYMM DESC) AS ROWN FROM SAPHEE.ZCST186N WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# ) D
ON A.MANDT = D.MANDT AND C.LGORT = D.BSU AND D.ROWN = 1
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST409 E ON A.MANDT = E.MANDT AND A.LIFNR = E.LIFNR
WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND C.BSU_ARA > '' AND C.BSU_GB = '1' /*Á÷¿µ*/
AND C.VKGRP IN (SELECT CODE2 AS CODE FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CODE1 = 'VKGRP' AND DTEXT1 = #DEPT#)
AND C.VKGRP = #VKGRP#
ORDER BY LIFNR WITH UR
